item.title: QA Engineer
item.description:
Job Description

We’re looking for a QA Engineer who can test applications using test data generated based on requirement specifications, with strong expertise in scripting and automation frameworks such as Playwright.

item.title: Frontend Developer
item.description:
Jobs Description

We’re looking for a Frontend Developer with 2-4 years of experience.
